experiences.description: Working with the growth team, introducing new apis and innovating in health tech industry.
Onboarded a chatbot and engineered ETL pipelines, enhancing system efficiency and reducing turnaround time.
Top Author and Moderator working on managing the community interactions on Forem on a part-time basis.
Collaborated on a projects, contributing to back-end development and debugging.
Developed full-stack applications with ReactJS and NodeJS, ensuring seamless integration.
